channel.title: Objects
channel.description: Stupid question but I am a new coder...how do you add objects?

item.title: Objects
item.dc:creator: @revengr revengr
item.description:
@revengr wrote:

This is done server side.

Open client.java and search…

public void NewObjects

Under that you should see tons of statements that look like this…

makeGlobalObject(####, ####, ####, #, 10);

This creates objects on the map.
The first number is the 4-digit x-coord the object will be placed at.
The second number is the 4-digit y-coord the object will be placed at.
The third number is the object ID.
The fourth number is the rotation. I don’t know what the numbers do, so you’ll have to experiment. Default is 0.
Leave the fifth number at 10.

Read full topic
